Angela Zhao is a PhD student in Biostatistics at Johns Hopkins University. She previously completed her Master's at Johns Hopkins (2024) and her undergraduate studies at McGill University School of Computer Science (2022).

Her research interests are mainly in methods of analyzing time-series data, including stochastic modeling, neural networks, and functional data analysis. Domain-specific interests include wearable device, imaging, and financial data. 

Hobbies include bouldering, investing, stand-up comedy, and playing classical music (fun fact: she previously taught piano for 4 years).
